title: Carbon Price Forecasting
description: An analyst needs to forecast the price of carbon allowances in a compliance market (e.g., EU ETS) to inform hedging decisions for fossil fuel assets.

tasks.description: Analyze historical carbon allowance prices and their correlation with economic activity and energy prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies key drivers of carbon prices.

tasks.description: Review upcoming regulatory changes that could affect the supply or demand for allowances.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notes a planned tightening of the emissions cap next year.

tasks.description: Generate a 3-year forecast for carbon prices, including a base case, high case, and low case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a forecast with a clear range of potential price outcomes.
